DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Telephone counsel nutritionist personal trainer may improve physical function quality life patient early-stage breast cancer prostate cancer . PURPOSE : Randomized clinical trial compare effectiveness home-based , diet exercise-based counseling program standard home-based counseling program promote health patient early-stage breast cancer prostate cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Study Health Promotion Patients With Early-Stage Breast Prostate Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Compare efficacy diet exercise-based home-based counseling program versus standard home-based counseling program improve physical function 6 12 month patient early-stage breast prostate cancer . - Compare effect home-based program diet quality , physical activity , weight status , depression , quality life patient . - Compare factor , gender , race , social support , interact home-based program predict program efficacy patient . OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study . Patients randomize 1 2 arm . - Arm I : Patients receive home-based telephone counsel personal nutritionist personal trainer . - Arm II : Patients receive home-based standard health telephone counseling unrelated area cancer care ( e.g. , sun exposure , screening , fall prevention ) . In arm , counsel continue every 2 week 6 month . Patients follow 6 month . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 420 patient ( 210 per arm ) accrue study .
